His doctor recommended a strict diet and exercise plan, but John has found it difficult to stick to. He has also been experiencing frequent headaches and fatigue, which he suspects may be related to his diabetes. John's father and grandfather also had diabetes, so he is concerned about the possibility of complications in the future.
